thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | www.flashbay.com | 2 of 510
thread.title: Erin Mystery

author: Erin Mystery
title: Erin Mystery
text: I sent out several emails to different flash vendors. Most responded right away, and I had follow up questions. Lucas from Flashbay was not only responsive, he actually answered ALL my questions and provided all the help I needed. The information was clear and he got me the product I wanted. My Flash drives arrived sooner than I expected and were perfect. I'm a very happy customer and I can't usually say that.
